name: GUI: Grab Ur Interface
description:
A 2D puzzle-platformer where you must drag elements of your HUD into the world to act as platforms and ladders, and doing so alters the behavior of the associated mechanic (e.g. Removing your health bar makes you immune to hazards). The catch: you need to possess all of your HUD elements in order to exit each level.

Can you make it all the way to the end?

--

This game was solo developed by me for a month long game jam where the theme was "Leave It Behind."
